anya-e0805n3:1: Atha nāmameva aññamaññasambandhīnaṁ samāsoti nāmanissitattā, sayañca nāmikattā nāmānantaraṁ samāso vuccate.
anya-e0805n3:2: So ca saññāvasena chabbidho abyayībhāvo kammadhārayo digu tappuriso bahubbīhi dvando cāti.
anya-e0805n3:6_1: cā’’ti lopo, nagarasaddato chaṭṭhekavacanaṁ sa, nagarassa samīpanti aññapadena viggahe –
anya-e0805n3:9_0: Upasaggapubbako, nipātapubbako ca nāmiko yuttattho teheva attapubbakehi upasagganipātehi
anya-e0805n3:9_1: saha niccaṁ samasīyate, so ca samāso abyayībhāvasañño hoti. Idha abyayībhāvādisaññāvidhāyakasuttāneva
anya-e0805n3:10_0: Tattha abyayamiti upasagganipātānaṁ saññā, liṅgavacanabhedepi byayarahitattā, abyayānaṁ
anya-e0805n3:10_1: atthaṁ vibhāvayatīti abyayībhāvo abyayatthapubbaṅgamattā, anabyayaṁ abyayaṁ bhavatīti
anya-e0805n3:10_2: vā abyayībhāvo. Pubbapadatthappadhāno hi abyayībhāvo, ettha ca ‘‘upasagganipātapubbako’’ti
anya-e0805n3:12: Tesaṁ nāmānaṁ payujjamānapadatthānaṁ yo yuttattho, so samāsasañño hoti, tadaññaṁ vākyamiti ruḷhaṁ.
anya-e0805n3:13: Nāmāni syādivibhatyantāni, samassateti samāso, saṅkhipiyatīti attho.
anya-e0805n3:17_1: paripuṇṇameva labbhati. Aluttasamāse pana atthasamasanameva vibhattilopābhāvato,
anya-e0805n3:17_2: tatthāpi vā ekapadattūpagamanato duvidhampi labbhateva. Dve hi samāsassa payojanāni
anya-e0805n3:18_0: Yutto attho yuttatto, atha vā yutto saṅgato, sambandho vā attho yassa soyaṁ yuttattho,
anya-e0805n3:18_1: etena saṅgatatthena yuttatthavacanena bhinnatthānaṁ ekatthībhāvo samāsalakkhaṇanti
anya-e0805n3:18_2: vuttaṁ hoti. Ettha ca ‘‘nāmāna’’nti vacanena ‘‘devadatto pacatī’’tiādīsu ākhyātena
anya-e0805n3:18_3: samāso na hotīti dasseti. Sambandhatthena pana yuttatthaggahaṇena ‘‘bhaṭo rañño putto
anya-e0805n3:18_5: aññasāpekkhesu ayuttatthatāya samāso na hotīti dīpeti.
anya-e0805n3:21_0: Idha padantarena vā taddhitappaccayehi vā āyādippaccayehi vā ekatthībhūtā yuttatthā
anya-e0805n3:21_1: nāma, tena ‘‘tesaṁ yuttatthānaṁ samāsānaṁ, taddhitāyādippaccayantānañca vibhattiyo
anya-e0805n3:21_2: lopanīyā hontī’’ti attho. Samāsaggahaṇādhikāre pana sati tesaṁgahaṇena vā taddhitāyādippaccayanta
anya-e0805n3:24_0: Luttāsu vibhattīsu sarantassa assa yuttatthabhūtassa tividhassapi liṅgassa pakatibhāvo
anya-e0805n3:24_1: hoti. Casaddena kiṁsamudaya idappaccayatādīsu niggahītantassapi. Nimittābhāve nemittakābhāvassa
anya-e0805n3:25: Sakatthavirahenidha samāsassa ca liṅgabhāvābhāvā vibhattuppattiyamasampattāyaṁ nāmabyapadesātidesamāha.
anya-e0805n3:27_0: Taddhitantā , kitantā, samāsā ca nāmamiva daṭṭhabbā tavetuna tvāna tvādippaccayante
anya-e0805n3:27_2: Idha samāsaggahaṇaṁ atthavataṁ samudāyānaṁ nāmabyapadeso samāsassevāti niyamatthanti apare.
anya-e0805n3:30_0: So abyayībhāvasamāso napuṁsakaliṅgova daṭṭhabboti napuṁsakaliṅgattaṁ. Ettha hi satipi
anya-e0805n3:30_2: ‘‘tipañña’’ntiādīsu viyāti daṭṭhabbaṁ, na cāyaṁ atideso, sutte atidesaliṅgassa ivasaddassa
anya-e0805n3:33: Tasmā akārantā abyayībhāvā parāsaṁ vibhattīnaṁ kvaci aṁ hoti, sesaṁ neyyaṁ.
anya-e0805n3:34: Taṁ upanagaraṁ, nagarassa samīpaṁ tiṭṭhatīti attho. Tāni upanagaraṁ, ālapanepevaṁ, taṁ upanagaraṁ passa, tāni upanagaraṁ.
anya-e0805n3:37_0: Tena upanagaraṁ kataṁ, upanagarena vā, tehi upanagaraṁ, upanagarehi vā, tassa upanagaraṁ
anya-e0805n3:37_1: dehi, tesaṁ upanagaraṁ, upanagarā ānaya, upanagaramhā upanagarasmā, upanagarehi,
anya-e0805n3:37_2: upanagaraṁ santakaṁ, upanagarassa vā, tesaṁ upanagaraṁ, upanagarānaṁ vā , upanagaraṁ
anya-e0805n3:37_3: nidhehi, upanagaramhi upanagarasmiṁ, upanagaraṁ upanagaresu vā. Evaṁ upakumbhaṁ.
anya-e0805n3:41: Vicchāyaṁ – attānamattānaṁ pati paccattaṁ, addhamāsaṁ addhamāsaṁ anu anvaddhamāsaṁ.
anya-e0805n3:43: Paṭilome – sotassa paṭilomaṁ paṭisotaṁ, paṭipathaṁ, pativātaṁ, attānaṁ adhikicca pavattā ajjhattaṁ.
anya-e0805n3:44: Pariyādābhividhīsu āpāṇakoṭiyā āpāṇakoṭikaṁ, ‘‘kvaci samāsantagatānamakāranto’’ti kappaccayo, ākumārehi yaso kaccāyanassa ākumāraṁ.
anya-e0805n3:45: Samiddhiyaṁ – bhikkhāya samiddhīti atthe samāseva napuṁsakaliṅgatte ca kate –
anya-e0805n3:48_0: Napuṁsake vattamānassa samāsassa anto saro rasso hoti. Ettha ca abyayībhāvaggahaṇaṁ
anya-e0805n3:48_1: nānuvattetabbaṁ, tena digudvandabahubbīhīsupi napuṁsake vattamānassa samāsantassarassa
anya-e0805n3:48_2: rassattaṁ siddhaṁ hoti. ‘‘Aṁ vibhattīna’’miccādinā amādeso, subhikkhaṁ. Gaṅgāya samīpe
anya-e0805n3:52_0: Akārantato aññasmā abyayībhāvasamāsā parāsaṁ vibhattīnaṁ lopo ca hoti. Adhitti, itthīsu
anya-e0805n3:52_1: adhikicca kathā pavattatīti attho. Adhitthi passa, adhitthi kataṁ iccādi, evaṁ adhikumāri,
anya-e0805n3:52_2: vadhuyā samīpaṁ upavadhu, gunnaṁ samīpaṁ upagu, okārassa rassattaṁ ukāro. Evaṁ upasaggapubbako.
anya-e0805n3:53_0: Nipātapubbako yathā – vuḍḍhānaṁ paṭipāṭi, ye ye vuḍḍhā vā yathāvuḍḍhaṁ, padatthānatikkame
anya-e0805n3:53_1: – yathākkamaṁ, yathāsatti, yathābalaṁ karoti, balamanatikkamitvā karotīti attho.
anya-e0805n3:53_2: Jīvassa yattako paricchedo yāvajīvaṁ, yāvatāyukaṁ, kappaccayo. Yattakena attho yāvadatthaṁ,
anya-e0805n3:53_3: pabbatassa parabhāgo tiropabbataṁ, tiropākāraṁ, tirokuṭṭaṁ, pāsādassa anto antopāsādaṁ,
anya-e0805n3:53_4: antonagaraṁ, antovassaṁ, nagarassa bahi bahinagaraṁ, pāsādassa upari uparipāsādaṁ,
anya-e0805n3:53_5: uparimañcaṁ, mañcassa heṭṭhā heṭṭhāmañcaṁ, heṭṭhāpāsādaṁ, bhattassa pure purebhattaṁ, evaṁ pacchābhattaṁ.
anya-e0805n3:54: Sākallatthe – saha makkhikāya samakkhikaṁ bhuñjati, na kiñci parivajjetīti attho. ‘‘Tesu vuddhī’’tiādinā sahasaddassa sādeso. Gaṅgāya oraṁ oragaṅgamiccādi.
anya-e0805n3:58: So ca navavidho visesanapubbapado visesanuttarapado visesanobhayapado upamānuttarapado sambhāvanāpubbapado avadhāraṇapubbapado nanipātapubbapado kupubbapado pādipubbapado cāti.
anya-e0805n3:59_0: Tattha visesanapubbapado tāva – ‘‘mahanta purisa’’itīdha ubhayattha paṭhamekavacanaṁ
anya-e0805n3:59_1: si, tulyādhikaraṇabhāvappasiddhatthaṁ casadda tasaddappayogo, mahanto ca so puriso cāti viggahe –
anya-e0805n3:60: Ito paraṁ ‘‘vibhāsā rukkhatiṇa’’iccādito ‘‘vibhāsā’’ti samāsavidhāne sabbattha vattate.
anya-e0805n3:62: Dve padāni nāmikāni tulyādhikaraṇāni aññamaññena saha vibhāsā samasyante, tasmiṁ dvipade tulyādhikaraṇe sati so samāso kammadhārayasañño ca hoti.
anya-e0805n3:63_0: Dve padāni dvipadaṁ, tulyaṁ samānaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ attho yassa padadvayassa taṁ tulyādhikaraṇaṁ,
anya-e0805n3:63_1: tasmiṁ dvipade tulyādhikaraṇe. Bhinnappavattinimittānaṁ dvinnaṁ padānaṁ visesanavisesitabbabhāvena
anya-e0805n3:63_2: ekasmiṁ atthe pavatti tulyādhikaraṇatā. Kammamiva dvayaṁ dhārayatīti kammadhārayo.
anya-e0805n3:63_3: Yathā hi kammaṁ kriyañca payojanañca dvayaṁ dhārayati, kamme sati kriyāya, payojanassa
anya-e0805n3:63_4: ca sambhavato, tathā ayaṁ samāso ekassa atthassa dve nāmāni dhārayati, tasmiṁ samāse
anya-e0805n3:64: Pure viya samāsasaññāvibhattilopapakatibhāvā, samāseneva tulyādhikaraṇabhāvassa vuttattā ‘‘vuttatthānamappayogo’’ti casadda tasaddānamappayogo.
anya-e0805n3:66_0: Mahanta saddassa mahā hoti tulyādhikaraṇe uttarapade pare. Mahatanti bahuvacanaggahaṇena
anya-e0805n3:66_1: kvaci mahaādeso ca, ettha ca visesanassa pubbanipāto visesanabhūtassa pubbapadassa
anya-e0805n3:70_0: Tassa puriso tappuriso, tappurisasadisattā ayampi samāso anvatthasaññāya tappurisoti
anya-e0805n3:70_1: vutto. Yathā hi tappurisasaddo guṇamativatto, tathā ayaṁ samāsopi. Uttarapadatthappadhāno
anya-e0805n3:70_2: hi tappurisoti. Tato nāmabyapadeso syādyuppatti. Ayaṁ pana tappuriso abhidheyyavacano, paraliṅgo ca.
anya-e0805n3:71_0: Mahāpuriso, mahāpurisā iccādi purisasaddasamaṁ, evaṁ mahāvīro, mahāmuni, mahantañca
anya-e0805n3:71_1: taṁ balañcāti mahābalaṁ, mahabbhayaṁ, mahaādeso. Santo ca so puriso cāti sappuriso,
anya-e0805n3:71_2: ‘‘santasaddassa so bhe bo cante’’ti ettha casaddena santasaddassa samāse abhakārepi
anya-e0805n3:71_3: sādeso, tathā pubbapuriso, parapuriso, paṭhamapuriso, majjhimapuriso, uttamapuriso,
anya-e0805n3:71_4: dantapuriso, paramapuriso, vīrapuriso, setahatthī, kaṇhasappo, nīluppalaṁ, lohitacandanaṁ.
anya-e0805n3:72: Kvaci vibhāsādhikārato na bhavati, yathā – puṇṇo mantāniputto, citto gahapati, sakko devarājāti.
anya-e0805n3:73: Pumā ca so kokilo cāti atthe samāse kate –
anya-e0805n3:76: Pumaiccetassa anto akāro lopamāpajjate liṅgādīsu parapadesu samāsesu, ‘‘aṁmo niggahītaṁ jhalapehī’’ti makārassa niggahītaṁ. Puṅkokilo. Evaṁ punnāgo.
anya-e0805n3:77: Khattiyā ca sā kaññā cāti viggayha samāse kate –
anya-e0805n3:78: ‘‘Tulyādhikaraṇe, pade, itthiyaṁ bhāsitapumitthī pumāva ce’’ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n3:80_0: Kammadhārayasaññe ca samāse itthiyaṁ vattamāne tulyādhikaraṇe uttarapade pare pubbabhūto
anya-e0805n3:80_1: itthivācako saddo pubbe bhāsitapumā ce, so pumā iva daṭṭhabboti pubbapade itthippaccayassa nivatti hoti.
anya-e0805n3:81: Khattiyakaññā, khattiyakaññāyo iccādi. Evaṁ rattalatā, dutiyabhikkhā, brāhmaṇī ca sā dārikā cāti brāhmaṇadārikā, nāgamāṇavikā.
anya-e0805n3:82: Pubbapadassevāyaṁ pumbhāvātideso, tena ‘‘khattiyakumārī kumārasamaṇī taruṇabrāhmaṇī’’tiādīsu uttarapadesu itthippaccayassa na nivatti hoti.
anya-e0805n3:84: Bhāsitapumāti kiṁ? Gaṅgānadī, taṇhānadī, pathavīdhātu. ‘‘Nandāpokkharaṇī, nandādevī’’tiādīsu pana saññāsaddattā na hoti.
anya-e0805n3:85_0: Tathā puratthimo ca so kāyo cāti puratthimakāyo, ettha ca kāyekadeso kāyasaddo. Evaṁ
anya-e0805n3:85_1: pacchimakāyo, heṭṭhimakāyo, uparimakāyo, sabbakāyo, purāṇavihāro, navāvāso, kataranikāyo,
anya-e0805n3:85_2: katamanikāyo, hetuppaccayo, abahulaṁ bahulaṁ katanti bahulīkataṁ, jīvitappadhānaṁ
anya-e0805n3:86_0: Visesanuttarapade jinavacanānuparodhato therācariyapaṇḍitādi visesanaṁ parañca bhavati.
anya-e0805n3:86_1: Yathā – sāriputto ca so thero cāti sāriputtatthero. Evaṁ mahāmoggallānatthero, mahākassapatthero,
anya-e0805n3:86_2: buddhaghosācariyo, dhammapālācariyo, ācariyaguttiloti vā, mahosadho ca so paṇḍito
anya-e0805n3:87_0: Visesanobhayapado yathā – sītañca taṁ uṇhañcāti sītuṇhaṁ, siniddho ca so uṇho cāti
anya-e0805n3:87_1: siniddhuṇho, māso. Khañjo ca so khujjo cāti khañjakhujjo. Evaṁ andhabadhiro, katākataṁ,
anya-e0805n3:88_0: Upamānuttarapade abhidhānānurodhato upamānabhūtaṁ visesanaṁ paraṁ bhavati. Yathā
anya-e0805n3:88_1: – sīho viya sīho, muni ca so sīho cāti munisīho. Evaṁ munivasabho, munipuṅgavo, buddhanāgo,
anya-e0805n3:88_2: buddhādicco, raṁsi viya raṁsi, saddhammo ca so raṁsi cāti saddhammaraṁsi. Evaṁ vinayasāgaro,
anya-e0805n3:88_3: puṇḍarīkamiva puṇḍarīko, samaṇo ca so puṇḍarīko cāti samaṇapuṇḍarīko, samaṇapadumo.
anya-e0805n3:88_4: Cando viya cando, mukhañca taṁ cando cāti mukhacando. Evaṁ mukhapadumaṁ iccādi.
anya-e0805n3:89_0: Sambhāvanāpubbapado yathā – dhammo iti buddhi dhammabuddhi. Evaṁ dhammasaññā, dhammasaṅkhāto,
anya-e0805n3:89_1: dhammasammato, pāṇasaññitā, asubhasaññā, aniccasaññā, anattasaññā, dhātusaññā, dhītusaññā,
anya-e0805n3:90_0: Avadhāraṇapubbapado yathā – guṇo eva dhanaṁ guṇadhanaṁ. Evaṁ saddhādhanaṁ, sīladhanaṁ,
anya-e0805n3:90_1: paññādhanaṁ, cakkhu eva indriyaṁ cakkhundriyaṁ. Evaṁ cakkhāyatanaṁ, cakkhudhātu,
anya-e0805n3:91: Nanipātapubbapado yathā – na brāhmaṇoti atthe kammadhārayasamāse, vibhattilopādimhi ca kate –
anya-e0805n3:94: Nassa nipātapadassa tappurise uttarapade pare sabbasseva attaṁ hoti. Tappurisekadesattā tappuriso, abrāhmaṇo.
anya-e0805n3:102_0: Tattha yo ‘‘asūriyapassā rājadārā’’tiādīsu viya uttarapadatthassa sabbathā abhāvaṁ
anya-e0805n3:102_1: dīpeti, so pasajjappaṭisedhavācī nāma. Yo pana ‘‘abrāhmaṇa amanussā’’tiādīsu viya
anya-e0805n3:102_2: uttarapadatthaṁ pariyudāsitvā taṁsadise vatthumhi kāriyaṁ paṭipādayati, so pariyudāsavācī nāma.
anya-e0805n3:107_1: brāhmaṇādisaddā hi kevalābrāhmaṇādiatthesveva pākaṭā, bhūsaddo viyasattāyaṁ, yadā
anya-e0805n3:107_2: te pana aññena sadisādivācakena naiti nipātena yujjanti, tadā taṁsadisatadaññatabbiruddhatadabhāvesupi
anya-e0805n3:107_3: vattanti, bhūsaddo viya anvabhiyādiyoge anubhavanaabhibhavanādīsu, tasmā uttarapadatthajotakoyevettha
anya-e0805n3:107_4: naiti nipātoti na doso, tena abrāhmaṇoti brāhmaṇasadisoti vuttaṁ hoti. Evaṁ amanusso, assamaṇo.
anya-e0805n3:108: Aññatthe – na byākatā abyākatā, asaṁkiliṭṭhā, apariyāpannā.
anya-e0805n3:109: Viruddhatthe – na kusalā akusalā, kusalapaṭipakkhāti attho. Evaṁ alobho, amitto.
anya-e0805n3:110: Pasajjappaṭisedhe – na katvā akatvā, akātuna puññaṁ akaronto.
anya-e0805n3:113: Naiccetassa padassa tappurise uttarapade ana hoti sare pare.
anya-e0805n3:114: Na asso anasso, na ariyo anariyo. Evaṁ anissaro, aniṭṭho, anupavādo, na ādāya anādāya, anoloketvā iccādi.
anya-e0805n3:115: Kupubbapado yathā – kucchitamannanti niccasamāsattā aññapadena viggaho, kammadhārayasamāse kate –
anya-e0805n3:118: Kuiccetassa nipātassa tappurise uttarapade kada hoti sare pare. Kadannaṁ. Evaṁ kadasanaṁ.
anya-e0805n3:119: Sareti kiṁ? Kudārā, kuputtā, kudāsā, kudiṭṭhi.
anya-e0805n3:122_0: Kuiccetassa appatthe vattamānassa kā hoti tappurise uttarapade pare. Bahuvacanuccāraṇato
anya-e0805n3:122_1: kucchitatthe ca kvaci tappurise. Appakaṁ lavaṇaṁ kālavaṇaṁ. Evaṁ kāpupphaṁ, kucchito
anya-e0805n3:123_0: Pādipubbapado ca niccasamāsova, padhānaṁ vacanaṁ pāvacanaṁ, bhusaṁ vaddhaṁ pavaddhaṁ,
anya-e0805n3:123_1: sarīraṁ, samaṁ, sammā vā ādhānaṁ samādhānaṁ, vividhā mati vimati, vividho kappo vikappo,
anya-e0805n3:123_2: visiṭṭho vā kappo vikappo, adhiko devo atidevo. Evaṁ adhidevo, adhisīlaṁ, sundaro
anya-e0805n3:123_3: gandho sugandho, kucchito gandho duggandho, sobhanaṁ kataṁ sukataṁ, asobhanaṁ kataṁ dukkaṭaṁ iccādi.
anya-e0805n3:124_0: Ye idha avihitalakkhaṇā nāmanipātopasaggā, tesaṁ ‘‘nāmānaṁ samāso’’ti yogavibhāgena
anya-e0805n3:124_1: samāso daṭṭhabbo. Yathā – apunageyyā gāthā, acandamullokikāni mukhāni, assaddhabhojī,
anya-e0805n3:125_0: Tathā diṭṭho pubbanti diṭṭhapubbo tathāgataṁ. Evaṁ sutapubbo dhammaṁ, gatapubbo maggaṁ,
anya-e0805n3:125_1: kammani diṭṭhā pubbanti diṭṭhapubbā devā tena. Evaṁ sutapubbā dhammā, gatapubbā disā,
anya-e0805n3:125_2: pahāro, parābhavo, vihāro, āhāro, upahāro iccādi.
anya-e0805n3:129: Tayo lokā samāhaṭā cittena sampiṇḍitā, tiṇṇaṁ lokānaṁ samāhāroti vā atthe –
anya-e0805n3:130: ‘‘Nāmānaṁ samāso yuttattho’’ti vattamāne ‘‘dvipade’’tiādinā kammadhārayasamāso, tato samāsasaññāyaṁ, vibhattilope, pakatibhāve ca kate –
anya-e0805n3:134_0: Dve gāvo digu, digusadisattā ayampi samāso digūti vutto. Atha vā saṅkhyāpubbattanapuṁsakekattasaṅkhātehi
anya-e0805n3:134_1: dvīhi lakkhaṇehi gato avagatoti digūti vuccati, dvīhi vā lakkhaṇehi gacchati pavattatīti
anya-e0805n3:134_2: digu. Ettha ca ‘‘saṅkhyāpubbo’’ti vuttattā saṅkhyāsaddasseva pubbanipāto, ‘‘ubhe
anya-e0805n3:138: Samāhāradigussetaṁ gahaṇaṁ, tattha sabbatthekavacanameva hoti, aññatra pana bahuvacanampi, nāmabyapadesasyādyuppatti amādesādi.
anya-e0805n3:139: Tilokaṁ, he tiloka, tilokaṁ, tilokena, tilokassa, tilokā tilokasmā tilokamhā, tilokassa, tiloke tilokamhi tilokasmiṁ.
anya-e0805n3:140_0: Evaṁ tayo daṇḍā tidaṇḍaṁ, tīṇi malāni samāhaṭāni, tiṇṇaṁ malānaṁ samāhāroti vā timalaṁ,
anya-e0805n3:140_1: tilakkhaṇaṁ, catussaccaṁ, catasso disā catuddisaṁ, ‘‘saro rasso napuṁsake’’ti rassattaṁ,
anya-e0805n3:140_2: pañcasikkhāpadaṁ, saḷāyatanaṁ, sattāhaṁ, aṭṭhasīlaṁ, navalokuttaraṁ, dasasīlaṁ, satayojanaṁ.
anya-e0805n3:141: Tathā – dve rattiyo dvirattaṁ, tisso rattiyo tirattaṁ, dve aṅguliyo dvaṅgulaṁ, satta godāvariyo, tāsaṁ samāhāroti vā sattagodāvaraṁ.
anya-e0805n3:144_0: Rājādigaṇassetaṁ gahaṇaṁ, tena samāsantagatānaṁ rājādīnaṁ nāmānaṁ anto kvaci akāro
anya-e0805n3:144_1: hotīti attho. Kāraggahaṇena bahubbīhādimhi samāsante kvaci kappaccayo hoti, surabhi
anya-e0805n3:145_0: Atha vā a ca ko ca akā, rakāro padasandhikaro, tena kvaci samāsantagatānamanto hutvā
anya-e0805n3:145_1: a ka iccete paccayā hontīti attho. Tena pañca gāvo samāhaṭāti atthe samāsādiṁ katvā
anya-e0805n3:145_2: samāsante appaccaye, ‘‘o sare cā’’ti avādese ca kate ‘‘pañcagava’’ntiādi ca sijjhati.
anya-e0805n3:146: Asamāhāradigu yathā – eko ca so puggalo cāti ekapuggalo. Evaṁ ekadhammo, ekaputto, tayo bhavā tibhavā, catasso disā catuddisā, dasasahassacakkavāḷāni iccādi.
anya-e0805n3:150: So pana dutiyādīsu chasu vibhattīsu bhāvato chabbidho. Tattha dutiyātappuriso gatanissitātītātikkantappattāpannādīhi bhavati.
anya-e0805n3:154: Amādivibhatyantāni yuttatthāni pubbapadāni nāmehi parapadebhi saha vibhāsā samasyante, so samāso tappurisasañño hoti. Ayañca tappuriso abhidheyyavacanaliṅgo.
anya-e0805n3:155_0: Gatādisaddā kitantattā tiliṅgā, vibhattilopādi sabbaṁ pubbasamaṁ. So saraṇagato,
anya-e0805n3:155_1: te saraṇagatā. Sā saraṇagatā, tā saraṇagatāyo. Taṁ kulaṁ saraṇagataṁ, tāni kulāni
anya-e0805n3:156_0: Evaṁ araññagato, bhūmigato, dhammaṁ nissito dhammanissito, atthanissito, bhavaṁ atīto
anya-e0805n3:156_1: bhavātīto, kālātīto, pamāṇaṁ atikkantaṁ pamāṇātikkantaṁ. Lokātikkantaṁ, sukhaṁ patto
anya-e0805n3:156_2: sukhappatto, dukkhappatto, sotaṁ āpanno sotāpanno, nirodhasamāpanno, rathaṁ āruḷho
anya-e0805n3:157_0: Upapadasamāse pana vuttiyeva tassa niccattā. Yathā – kammaṁ karotīti kammakāro, kumbhakāro,
anya-e0805n3:157_1: atthaṁ kāmetīti atthakāmo, dhammakāmo, dhammaṁ dhāretīti dhammadharo, vinayadharo,
anya-e0805n3:158_0: Tavantumānantādikitantehi vākyameva vavatthitavibhāsādhikārato. Yathā – odanaṁ bhuttavā,
anya-e0805n3:158_1: dhammaṁ suṇamāno, dhammaṁ suṇanto, kaṭaṁ karāno, anabhidhānato vā, abhidhānalakkhaṇā
anya-e0805n3:160: Tatiyā kitaka pubba sadisa samūnattha kalaha nipuṇa missasakhilādīhi.
anya-e0805n3:161_0: Buddhena bhāsito buddhabhāsito, dhammo. Evaṁ jinadesito, satthārā vaṇṇito satthuvaṇṇito,
anya-e0805n3:161_1: viññūhi garahito viññugarahito, viññuppasattho, issarakataṁ, sayaṁkataṁ, sukehi āhaṭaṁ
anya-e0805n3:161_2: sukāhataṁ, raññā hato rājahato, rogapīḷito, aggidaḍḍho, sappadaṭṭho, sallena viddho
anya-e0805n3:161_3: sallaviddho, icchāya apakato icchāpakato, sīlena sampanno sīlasampanno. Evaṁ sukhasahagataṁ,
anya-e0805n3:161_4: ñāṇasampayuttaṁ, mittasaṁsaggo, piyavippayogo, jātitthaddho, guṇahīno, guṇavuḍḍho,
anya-e0805n3:161_5: catuvaggakaraṇīyaṁ, catuvaggādikattabbaṁ, kākehi peyyā kākapeyyā, nadī.
anya-e0805n3:162: Kvaci vuttiyeva, urena gacchatīti urago, pādena pivatīti pādapo. Kvaci vākyameva, parasunā chinnavā, kākehi pātabbā, dassanena pahātabbā.
anya-e0805n3:163_0: Pubbādiyoge – māsena pubbo māsapubbo. Evaṁ mātusadiso, pitusamo, ekūnavīsati, sīlavikalo,
anya-e0805n3:163_1: asikalaho, vācānipuṇo, yāvakālikasaṁmissaṁ, vācāsakhilo, satthārā sadiso satthukappo,
anya-e0805n3:163_2: puññena atthiko puññatthiko, guṇādhiko, guḷena saṁsaṭṭho odano guḷodano, khīrodano,
anya-e0805n3:163_3: assena yutto ratho assaratho, maggacittaṁ, jambuyā paññāto lakkhito dīpo jambudīpo,
anya-e0805n3:163_4: ekena adhikā dasa ekādasa, jātiyā andho jaccandho, pakatiyā medhāvī pakatimedhāvī iccādi.
anya-e0805n3:166_0: Tadatthe – kathinassa dussaṁ kathinadussaṁ, kathinacīvaratthāyāti attho. Evaṁ cīvaradussaṁ,
anya-e0805n3:166_1: cīvaramūlyaṁ, yāguyā atthāya taṇḍulā yāgutaṇḍulā, bhattataṇḍulā, saṅghassatthāya
anya-e0805n3:166_2: bhattaṁ saṅghabhattaṁ, āgantukānamatthāya bhattaṁ āgantukabhattaṁ. Evaṁ gamikabhattaṁ,
anya-e0805n3:167_0: Atthe bhikkhusaṅghassatthāya vihāro bhikkhusaṅghattho vihāro, bhikkhusaṅghatthā yāgu,
anya-e0805n3:167_1: bhikkhusaṅghatthaṁ cīvaraṁ. Yassatthāya yadattho, yadatthā, yadatthaṁ. Evaṁ tadattho,
anya-e0805n3:167_2: tadatthā. Tadatthaṁ. Etadattho vāyāmo, etadatthā kathā, etadatthaṁ sotāvadhānaṁ.
anya-e0805n3:167_3: Kimatthaṁ, attatthaṁ, paratthaṁ, vinayo saṁvaratthāya, sukhaṁ samādhatthāya, nibbidā
anya-e0805n3:167_4: virāgatthāya, virāgo vimuttatthāya. Tathā lokassa hito lokahito, buddhassa deyyaṁ
anya-e0805n3:167_5: buddhadeyyaṁ, pupphaṁ. Saṅghadeyyaṁ, cīvaraṁ. Idha na bhavati, saṅghassa dātabbaṁ,
anya-e0805n3:170_0: Methunasmā apeto methunāpeto. Evaṁ palāpāpagato, nagaraniggato, piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto.
anya-e0805n3:170_1: Gāmato nikkhantaṁ gāmanikkhantaṁ, rukkhaggā patito rukkhaggapatito, sāsanacuto, āpattivuṭṭhānaṁ,
anya-e0805n3:171_0: Bhayatthādiyoge yathā – rājato bhayaṁ rājabhayaṁ, corehi bhayaṁ corabhayaṁ, amanussehi
anya-e0805n3:171_1: bhayaṁ amanussabhayaṁ, aggito bhayaṁ aggibhayaṁ. Pāpato bhīto pāpabhīto , pāpabhīruko,
anya-e0805n3:171_2: akattabbato virati akattabbavirati. Evaṁ kāyaduccaritavirati, vacīduccaritavirati,
anya-e0805n3:171_3: bandhanā mutto bandhanamutto, vanamutto, bandhanamokkho, kammato samuṭṭhitaṁ kammasamuṭṭhitaṁ,
anya-e0805n3:172: Kvaci vuttiyeva, kammato jātaṁ kammajaṁ. Evaṁ cittajaṁ, utujaṁ, āhārajaṁ. Idha na bhavati, pāsādā patito.
anya-e0805n3:174_0: Chaṭṭhī rañño putto rājaputto. Evaṁ rājapuriso, ācariyapūjako, buddhasāvako, buddharūpaṁ,
anya-e0805n3:174_1: jinavacanaṁ, samuddaghoso, dhaññānaṁ rāsi dhaññarāsi, pupphagandho, phalaraso, kāyassa
anya-e0805n3:174_2: lahutā kāyalahutā, maraṇassati, rukkhamūlaṁ, ayassa patto ayopatto, evaṁ suvaṇṇakaṭāhaṁ,
anya-e0805n3:175_0: ‘‘Devānaṁ rājā’’ti atthe samāsādimhi kate ‘‘kvaci samāsantagatānamakāranto’’ti akāro,
anya-e0805n3:175_1: tato ‘‘syā cā’’ti āttaṁ na bhavati. Devarājo, devarājā, devarājaṁ, devarāje iccādi
anya-e0805n3:175_2: purisasaddasamaṁ. Attābhāve so devarājā, te devarājāno iccādi rājasaddasamaṁ. Tathā
anya-e0805n3:175_3: devānaṁ sakhā devasakho, devasakhā, so devasakhā, te devasakhāno iccādi.
anya-e0805n3:176: Pumassa liṅgaṁ pulliṅgaṁ. Evaṁ pumbhāvo, pumantalopādi.
anya-e0805n3:177: Hatthipadaṁ, itthirūpaṁ, bhikkhunisaṅgho, jambusākhā, ettha ca ‘‘kvacādimajjhuttarāna’’ntiādinā majjhe īkārūkārānaṁ rassattaṁ.
anya-e0805n3:178: Vibhāsādhikārato kvaci vākyameva, sahasā kammassa kattāro, bhinnānaṁ sandhātā, kappassa tatiyo bhāgo, yā ca pakkhassa aṭṭhamī, manussānaṁ khattiyo sūratamo.
anya-e0805n3:179_0: Yuttattho icceva? ‘‘Bhaṭo rañño puriso devadattassā’’ti ettha ‘‘bhaṭasambandhe chaṭṭhī’’ti
anya-e0805n3:179_1: aññamaññānapekkhatāya ayuttatthabhāvato samāso na bhavati, ‘‘kosalassa rañño putto’’tiādīsu
anya-e0805n3:179_2: pana sāpekkhatāya asamatthattā na bhavati, sambandhīsaddānaṁ pana niccaṁ sāpekkhattepi
anya-e0805n3:179_3: gamakattā samāso, yathā – devadattassa gurukulaṁ, bhagavato sāvakasaṅghotiādi.
anya-e0805n3:181_0: Sattamī rūpe saññā rūpasaññā, evaṁ rūpasañcetanā, saṁsāradukkhaṁ, cakkhumhi sannissitaṁ
anya-e0805n3:181_1: viññāṇaṁ cakkhuviññāṇaṁ, dhamme rato dhammarato, dhammābhirati, dhammaruci, dhammagāravo,
anya-e0805n3:181_2: dhammesu nirutti dhammanirutti, dānādhimutti, bhavantarakataṁ, dassane assādo dassanassādo,
anya-e0805n3:181_3: araññe vāso araññavāso, vikāle bhojanaṁ vikālabhojanaṁ, kāle vassaṁ kālavassaṁ, vane
anya-e0805n3:181_4: pupphaṁ vanapupphaṁ. Evaṁ vanamahiso, gāmasūkaro, samuddamaccho, āvāṭakacchapo, āvāṭamaṇḍūko,
anya-e0805n3:181_5: kūpamaṇḍūko, titthanāvā, itthīsu dhutto itthidhutto chāyāya sukkho chāyāsukkho, aṅgārapakkaṁ, cārakabaddho.
anya-e0805n3:182_0: Idha vuttiyeva, yathā – vane caratīti vanacaro, kucchimhi sayatīti kucchisayo, thale
anya-e0805n3:182_1: tiṭṭhatīti thalaṭṭho. Evaṁ jalaṭṭho, pabbataṭṭho, maggaṭṭho, paṅke jātaṁ paṅkajaṁ,
anya-e0805n3:183: Idha na bhavati, bhojane mattaññutā, indriyesu guttadvāratā, āsane nisinno, āsane nisīditabbaṁ.
anya-e0805n3:185: ‘‘Tadanuparodhenā’’ti vuttattā yathābhidhānaṁ tappurise kvaci accantādīsu amādivibhatyantaṁ pubbapadaṁ paraṁ sambhavati.
anya-e0805n3:186_0: Yathā – antaṁ atikkantaṁ accantaṁ, accantāni, velaṁ atikkanto ativelo, rassattaṁ.
anya-e0805n3:186_1: Evaṁ mālaṁ atīto atimālo, pattajīviko, āpannajīviko, akkhaṁ patigataṁ nissitanti
anya-e0805n3:186_2: paccakkhaṁ dassanaṁ, paccakkho attabhāvo, paccakkhā buddhi, atthaṁ anugataṁ anvatthaṁ,
anya-e0805n3:186_3: kokilāya avakuṭṭhaṁ avakokilaṁ vanaṁ, pariccattanti attho. Avamayūraṁ, ajjhayanāya
anya-e0805n3:186_4: parigilāno pariyajjhayano, kammassa alaṁ samatthoti alaṁkammo, vacanāya alanti alaṁvacano,
anya-e0805n3:186_5: vānato nikkhantaṁ nibbānaṁ, kilesehi nikkhanto nikkileso, niraṅgaṇo, kosambiyā nikkhanto
anya-e0805n3:186_6: nikkosambī, vanato niyyāto nibbano, ācariyato paro pācariyo. Evaṁ payyako, parahiyyo,
anya-e0805n3:186_7: gaṅgāya upari uparigaṅgaṁ. Evaṁ heṭṭhānadī, antosamāpatti, haṁsānaṁ rājā rājahaṁso,
anya-e0805n3:186_8: haṁsarājā vā, māsassa addhaṁ addhamāsaṁ, māsaddhaṁ vā, āmalakassa addhaṁ addhāmalakaṁ,
anya-e0805n3:186_9: āmalakaddhaṁ vā, kahāpaṇassa aḍḍhaṁ aḍḍhakahāpaṇaṁ, aḍḍhamāsakaṁ, rattiyā aḍḍhaṁ
anya-e0805n3:186_10: aḍḍharattaṁ, rattiyā pubbaṁ pubbarattaṁ, rattiyā pacchā pacchārattaṁ. Ettha ca ‘‘kvaci
anya-e0805n3:186_11: samāsantagatānamakāranto’’ti rattisaddantassa attaṁ, ahassa pubbaṁ pubbanhaṁ. Evaṁ
anya-e0805n3:189_0: Yathā – pabhaṁ karotīti atthe ‘‘amādayo parapadebhī’’ti samāso, ‘‘nāmānaṁ samāso
anya-e0805n3:189_1: yuttattho’’ti samāsasaññā, tato ‘‘tesaṁ vibhattiyo lopā cā’’ti vibhattilope sampatte
anya-e0805n3:189_2: tattheva caggahaṇena pubbapade vibhattilopābhāvo. Sesaṁ samaṁ. Pabhaṅkaro, amataṁ
anya-e0805n3:189_3: dadātīti amatandado, raṇaṁ jahātīti raṇañjaho, jutiṁ dhāretīti jutindharo, tathā
anya-e0805n3:189_4: sahasākataṁ, parassapadaṁ. Attanopadaṁ, bhayato upaṭṭhānaṁ bhayatūpaṭṭhānaṁ, paratoghoso,
anya-e0805n3:189_5: gavaṁpatitthero, manasikāro, pubbenivāso, pubbenivāsānussati, majjhekalyāṇaṁ, antevāsī,
anya-e0805n3:194: So ca navavidho dvipado tulyādhikaraṇo, dvipado bhinnādhikaraṇo, tipado nanipātapubbapado, sahapubbapado upamānapubbapado saṅkhyobhayapado disantarāḷattho byatihāralakkhaṇo cāti.
anya-e0805n3:195: Tattha dvipado tulyādhikaraṇo bahubbīhi kammādīsu chasu vibhatyatthesu bhavati.
anya-e0805n3:196: Tattha dutiyatthe tāva – ‘‘āgatā samaṇā imaṁ saṅghārāma’’nti viggahe –
anya-e0805n3:198: Samasyamānapadato aññesaṁ paṭhamadutiyādivibhatyantānaṁ padānamatthesu yuttatthāni nāmāni vibhāsā samasyante, so samāso bahubbīhisañño ca hoti.
anya-e0805n3:199: Bahavo vīhayo yassa so bahubbīhi, bahubbīhisadisattā ayampisamāso anvatthasaññāvasena bahubbīhīti vutto, aññapadatthappadhāno hi bahubbīhi.
anya-e0805n3:200: Duvidho cāyaṁ bahubbīhi tagguṇasaṁviññāṇātagguṇasaṁviññāṇavasena, tesu yattha visesanabhūto attho aññapadatthaggahaṇena gayhati, so tagguṇasaṁviññāṇo, yathā – lambakaṇṇamānayāti.
anya-e0805n3:201: Yattha pana na gayhati, so atagguṇasaṁviññāṇo, yathā – bahudhanamānayāti.
anya-e0805n3:202: Idha bahubbīhisadde viya visesanassa pubbanipāto, sesaṁ pubbasamaṁ.
anya-e0805n3:203_0: Āgatasamaṇo saṅghārāmo. Ettha ca āgatasaddo, samaṇasaddo ca attano atthe aṭṭhatvā
anya-e0805n3:203_2: tadanantaraṁ ‘‘saṅghārāmo’’ti padantaraṁ payujjati, tato samāseneva kammatthassa
anya-e0805n3:203_3: abhihitattā puna dutiyā na hoti. Idaṁsaddassa ca appayogo, evaṁ sabbattha. Bahubbīhi
anya-e0805n3:204_0: Tathā āgatasamaṇā sāvatthi, āgatasamaṇaṁ jetavanaṁ, paṭipannā addhikā yaṁ pathaṁ
anya-e0805n3:204_1: soyaṁ paṭipannaddhiko patho , abhiruḷhā vāṇijā yaṁ nāvaṁ sā abhiruḷhavāṇijā nāvā.
anya-e0805n3:205_0: Tatiyatthe bahubbīhi yathā – jitāni indriyāni yena samaṇena soyaṁ jitindriyo samaṇo.
anya-e0805n3:205_1: Evaṁ diṭṭhadhammo, pattadhammo, katakicco, jitā mārā anenāti jitamāro bhagavā, paṭividdhasabbadhammo.
anya-e0805n3:206: Catutthiyatthe bahubbīhi yathā – dinno suṅko yassa rañño soyaṁ dinnasuṅko rājā, upanītaṁ bhojanaṁ assa samaṇassāti upanītabhojano samaṇo, upahaṭo bali assāti upahaṭabali yakkho.
anya-e0805n3:207_0: Pañcamiyatthe bahubbīhi yathā – niggatā janā asmā gāmā soyaṁ niggatajano gāmo, niggato
anya-e0805n3:207_1: ayo asmāti nirayo, niggatā kilesā etasmāti nikkileso, apetaṁ viññāṇaṁ asmāti apetaviññāṇo
anya-e0805n3:207_2: matakāyo, apagataṁ bhayabheravaṁ asmāti apagatabhayabheravo arahā.
anya-e0805n3:208_0: Chaṭṭhiyatthe bahubbīhi yathā – chinnā hatthā yassa purisassa soyaṁ chinnahattho
anya-e0805n3:208_1: puriso. Evaṁ paripuṇṇasaṅkappo, khīṇāsavo, vīto rāgo assāti vītarāgo, dve padāni
anya-e0805n3:208_2: assāti dvipado, dvihattho paṭo, tevijjo, catuppado, pañca cakkhūni assāti pañcacakkhu
anya-e0805n3:208_3: bhagavā, chaḷabhiñño, rassattaṁ, navaṅgaṁ satthusāsanaṁ, dasabalo, anantañāṇo, tīṇi
anya-e0805n3:208_4: dasa parimāṇametesanti tidasā devā, samāsantassa attaṁ, idha parimāṇasaddassa sannidhānato
anya-e0805n3:208_5: dasasaddo saṅkhyāne vattate, ayaṁ paccayo etesanti idappaccayā, ko pabhavo assāti
anya-e0805n3:208_6: kiṁpabhavo ayaṁ kāyo, vigataṁ malamassāti vimalo, sundaro gandho assāti sugandhaṁ
anya-e0805n3:208_7: candanaṁ. Evaṁ susīlo, sumukho, kucchito gandho assāti duggandhaṁ kuṇapaṁ, duṭṭhu
anya-e0805n3:208_8: mano assāti dummano. Evaṁ dussīlo, dummukho, tapo eva dhanaṁ assāti tapodhano, khantisaṅkhātaṁ
anya-e0805n3:208_9: balaṁ assāti khantibalo, indoti nāmaṁ etassāti indanāmo.
anya-e0805n3:209_0: Chandajātādīsu visesanavisesitabbānaṁ yathicchitattā ubhayaṁ pubbaṁ nipatati, yathā
anya-e0805n3:209_1: – chando jāto assāti chandajāto, jāto chando assātipi jātachando. Evaṁ sañjātapītisomanasso,
anya-e0805n3:213_0: Itthiyaṁ vattamāne tulyādhikaraṇe pade pare pubbe bhāsitapumā itthivācako saddo atthi
anya-e0805n3:213_1: ce, so pumā iva daṭṭhabboti pubbapade itthippaccayābhāvo, bahubbīhivisayoyaṁ, upari
anya-e0805n3:215: Kvaci taddhitasamāsanāmopasaggādīsu padesu ādimajjhuttarabhūtānaṁ sarānaṁ jinavacanānuparodhena dīgharassā honti paccayesu, apaccayesu paresu, aparabhūtesu ca.
anya-e0805n3:218: Rassattaṁ ajjave itthi- rūpādo ca ka, tādisūti.
anya-e0805n3:219_0: Bahubbīhisamāse sati pulliṅge uttarapadantassa rassattaṁ. Dīghajaṅgho puriso, tathā
anya-e0805n3:219_1: pahūtā jivhā assāti pahūtajivho bhagavā. Mahatī paññā assāti mahāpañño. ‘‘Mahataṁ
anya-e0805n3:220_0: Itthiyamiti kiṁ? Khamādhano. Bhāsitapumāti kiṁ? Saddhādhuro, saddhāpakatiko, paññāpakatiko,
anya-e0805n3:220_1: paññāvisuddhiko, ettha ca ‘‘kvaci samāsantagatānamakāranto’’ti kappaccayo. Tulyādhikaraṇe
anya-e0805n3:221: Pubbapadassevāyaṁ pumbhāvātideso, tena idha na bhavati. Bahudāsiko puriso. Bahukumārikaṁ kulaṁ.
anya-e0805n3:224: Tipadamidaṁ. Kvacisamāsantagatā dhanusaddā āpaccayo hoti, casaddena dhammādito ca, ‘‘vamodudantāna’’nti vakāro, gāṇṭhivadhanvā. Evaṁ paccakkhadhammā.
anya-e0805n3:226_0: Nānādumapatitapupphavāsitasānu iccatra – nānappakārā dumā nānādumā, nānādumehi patitāni
anya-e0805n3:226_1: nānādumapatitāni, nānādumapatitāni ca tāni pupphāni cāti nānādumapatitapupphāni,
anya-e0805n3:226_2: tehi vāsitā nānādumapatitapupphavāsitā, nānādumapatitapupphavāsitā sānū yassa pabbatassa
anya-e0805n3:226_3: soyaṁ nānādumapatitapupphavāsitasānu pabbato. Ayaṁ pana kammadhārayatappurisagabbho
anya-e0805n3:227_0: Tathā byālambo ambudharo byālambambudharo, tassa bindūni byālambambudharabindūni,
anya-e0805n3:227_1: tehi cumbito byālambambudharabinducumbito, tādiso kūṭo yassa soyaṁ byālambambudharabinducumbitakūṭo iccādi.
anya-e0805n3:228_0: Sattamiyatthe bahubbīhi yathā – sampannāni sassāni yasmiṁ janapade soyaṁ sampannasasso
anya-e0805n3:228_1: janapado, sulabho piṇḍo imasminti sulabhapiṇḍo deso. Ākiṇṇā manussā yassaṁ rājadhāniyaṁ
anya-e0805n3:228_2: sā ākiṇṇamanussā rājadhānī, bahavo tāpasā etasminti bahutāpaso assamo, upacitaṁ maṁsalohitaṁ
anya-e0805n3:228_3: asminti upacitamaṁsalohitaṁ sarīraṁ, bahavo sāmino asminti bahussāmikaṁ nagaraṁ.
anya-e0805n3:232_0: Samāsantagatā nadimhā kappaccayo hoti, casaddena tuantā ca. Niccatthaṁ vacanaṁ. Nadīti
anya-e0805n3:232_2: nadisaññassa kappaccaye rassattaṁ, bahunadiko janapado. Evaṁ bahujambukaṁ vanaṁ.
anya-e0805n3:232_3: Bahunārikoti chaṭṭhībahubbīhinā siddhaṁ. Bahavo kattāro asmiṁ, assāti vā bahukattuko
anya-e0805n3:233_0: Bhinnādhikaraṇo yathā – ekarattiṁ vāso assāti ekarattivāso, samānena janena saddhiṁ
anya-e0805n3:233_1: vāso assāti samānavāso puriso. Ubhato byañjanamassa atthīti ubhabhobyañjanako, chattaṁ
anya-e0805n3:233_2: pāṇimhi assāti chattapāṇi puriso. Evaṁ daṇḍapāṇi, satthapāṇi, vajirapāṇi, khaggahattho,
anya-e0805n3:233_3: satthahattho, dāne ajjhāsayo assāti dānajjhāsayo, dānādhimuttiko, buddhabhattiko,
anya-e0805n3:234_0: Tipado yathā – parakkamenādhigatā sampadā yehi te bhavanti parakkamādhigatasampadā
anya-e0805n3:234_1: mahāpurisā. Evaṁ dhammādhigatabhogā, oṇīto pattato pāṇi yena soyaṁ oṇītapattapāṇi,
anya-e0805n3:234_2: sīhassa pubbaddhaṁ viya kāyo assāti sīhapubbaddhakāyo, mattā bahavo mātaṅgā asminti
anya-e0805n3:235_0: Nanipātapubbapado yathā – natthi etassa samoti asamo bhagavā. Idha ‘‘attaṁ nassa
anya-e0805n3:235_1: tappurise’’ti sutte ‘‘attaṁ nassā’’ti yogavibhāgena nassa attaṁ. Evaṁ appaṭipuggalo,
anya-e0805n3:235_2: aputtako, ahetuko, ‘‘kvaci samāsanta’’iccādinā kappaccayo, natthi saṁvāso etesanti
anya-e0805n3:235_3: asaṁvāsā, na vijjate vuṭṭhi etthāti avuṭṭhiko janapado, abhikkhuko vihāro, natthi
anya-e0805n3:235_4: etassa uttaroti anuttaro, ‘‘sare ana’’ti ana, tappurisaggahaṇamupalakkhaṇaṁ, athavā
anya-e0805n3:235_5: ‘‘tesu vuddhī’’tiādinā nassa ana. Evaṁ natthi anto assāti anantaṁ, na vijjanti āsavā
anya-e0805n3:236_0: Paṭhamāyatthe sahapubbapado yathā – saha hetunā yo vattateti sahetuko, sahetu vā,
anya-e0805n3:236_2: ca, saha pītiyā ime vattantīti sappītikā. Evaṁ saha paccayehi vattantīti sappaccayā,
anya-e0805n3:236_3: sakileso, saupādāno, saparivāro, saha mūlena uddhato samūluddhato rukkho.
anya-e0805n3:237_1: kāyabyāmānaṁ samappamāṇatāya nigrodho iva parimaṇḍalo yo rājakumāro soyaṁnigrodhaparimaṇḍalo
anya-e0805n3:237_2: rājakumāro. ‘‘Vuttatthānamappayogo’’ti ivasaddassa appayogo, saṅkho viya paṇḍaro
anya-e0805n3:237_3: ayanti saṅkhapaṇḍaro, kāko viya sūro ayanti kākasūro, cakkhu iva bhūto ayaṁ paramatthadassanatoti
anya-e0805n3:237_4: cakkhubhūto bhagavā. Evaṁ atthabhūto. Dhammabhūto, brahmabhūto, andho viya bhūto
anya-e0805n3:237_5: ayanti andhabhūto bālo. Muñjapabbajamiva bhūtā ayanti muñjapabbajabhūtā kudiṭṭhi.
anya-e0805n3:238_0: Chaṭṭhiyatthe – suvaṇṇavaṇṇo viya vaṇṇo yassa soyaṁ suvaṇṇavaṇṇo bhagavā. Uttarapadalopo,
anya-e0805n3:238_1: nāgassa viya assa gatīti nāgagati. Evaṁ sīhagati, nāgavikkamo, sīhavikkamo, sīhahanu,
anya-e0805n3:238_2: eṇissa viya assa jaṅghāti eṇijaṅgho, sīhassa pubbaddhaṁ viya assa kāyoti sīhapubbaddhakāyo,
anya-e0805n3:238_3: brahmuno viya aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgato saro assāti brahmassaro.
anya-e0805n3:239_0: Vāsaddatthesaṅkhyobhayapado yathā – dve vā tayo vā pattā dvattipattā, ‘‘dvekaṭṭhānamākāro
anya-e0805n3:239_1: vā’’ti dvisaddantassa āttaṁ, rassattaṁ, dvīhaṁ vā tīhaṁ vā dvīhatīhaṁ, cha vā pañca
anya-e0805n3:239_2: vā vācā chappañcavācā. Evaṁ sattaṭṭhamāsā, ekayojanadviyojanāni.
anya-e0805n3:240_0: Disantarāḷattho yathā – pubbassā ca dakkhiṇassā ca disāya yadantarāḷaṁ sāyaṁ pubbadakkhiṇā
anya-e0805n3:240_2: disantarāḷatthe pubbapadassa rassattaṁ. Evaṁ pubbuttarā, aparadakkhiṇā, pacchimuttarā.
anya-e0805n3:240_3: Yadā pana dakkhiṇā ca sā pubbā cāti kammadhārayasamāso hoti, tadā pumbhāvātideso
anya-e0805n3:240_4: uttarapadatthappadhānattā, sabbanāmikavidhānampi niccaṁ bhavatiyeva, yathā – dakkhiṇapubbassā,
anya-e0805n3:241_0: Byatihāralakkhaṇo yathā – kesesu ca kesesu ca gahetvā idaṁ yuddhaṁ pavattatīti kesākesi,
anya-e0805n3:241_1: daṇḍehi ca daṇḍehi ca paharitvā idaṁ yuddhaṁ pavattatīti daṇḍādaṇḍi, ‘‘kvacādimajjhuttarāna’’ntiādinā
anya-e0805n3:247: Tattha itarītarayoge tāva – ‘‘sāriputtamoggallāna’’itīdha ubhayatthāpi paṭhamekavacanaṁ, samuccayajotanatthaṁ casaddappayogo ca.
anya-e0805n3:250: Nānānāmānameva ekavibhattikānaṁ yuttatthānaṁ yo samuccayo, so vibhāsā samāso bhavati, dvandasañño ca.
anya-e0805n3:251: Ettha ca samuccayo nāma sampiṇḍanaṁ, so pana atthavasena kevalasamuccayo anvācayo itarītarayogo samāhāro cāti catubbidho.
anya-e0805n3:252_0: Tattha kevalasamuccaye, anvācaye ca samāso na bhavati, kriyāsāpekkhatāya nāmānaṁ
anya-e0805n3:252_1: aññamaññaṁ ayuttatthabhāvato, yathā – cīvaraṁ piṇḍapātañca paccayaṁ sayanāsanaṁ adāsi,
anya-e0805n3:252_2: dānañca dehi, sīlañca rakkhāhi. Itarītarayoge, samāhāre ca samāso bhavati, tattha
anya-e0805n3:253: Dve dve padāni dvandā, dvandaṭṭhā vā dvandā, dvandasadisattā ayaṁ samāsopi anvatthasaññāya dvandoti vuccati, ubhayapadatthappadhāno hi dvando.
anya-e0805n3:254_0: Nanu ca ubhayapadatthappadhānatte sati dvande kathamekatthībhāvo siyāti? Vuccate
anya-e0805n3:254_2: na virodho, tañca dvandavisayameva, tesamatthadvayadīpakattā. Yathā hi bhūsaddo anubhavaabhibhavādike
anya-e0805n3:254_3: atthe anvabhiādiupasaggasahitova dīpeti, na kevalo, evaṁ ‘‘gavassaka’’ntiādīsu gavādīnaṁ
anya-e0805n3:254_4: assādisaddantarasahitānameva atthadvayadīpanaṁ, na kevalānanti tañca dvandavisayameva,
anya-e0805n3:254_5: na sabbatthāti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Atha vā dvinnampi yathāvuttasamuccayadīpakattā atthi dvandepekatthitāti
anya-e0805n3:254_6: na koci virodho, tato samāsasaññāvibhattilopādi vuttanayameva, samāseneva catthassa
anya-e0805n3:255: Idha dvande accitataraṁ pubbaṁ nipatati, parasseva liṅgañca. Itarītarayogassa avayavappadhānattā sabbattha bahuvacanameva.
anya-e0805n3:256_0: Sāriputtamoggallānā, sāriputtamoggallāne, sāriputtamoggallānehi iccādi, samaṇo ca
anya-e0805n3:256_1: brāhmaṇo ca samaṇabrāhmaṇā. Evaṁ brāhmaṇagahapatikā, khattiyabrāhmaṇā, devamanussā,
anya-e0805n3:256_2: candimasūriyā, mātā ca pitā ca mātāpitaro, ‘‘tesu vuddhī’’tiādinā dvande mātuādipubbapadukārassa
anya-e0805n3:260: Jāyāsaddassa tudaṁ jāniiccete ādesā honti patisadde pare kvaci. Tudaṁpati, jānipati, jayampatikā. Ettha niggahītāgamo, ‘‘kvacā’’dinā rassattañca.
anya-e0805n3:261_0: Kvaci appasaraṁ pubbaṁ nipatati, yathā – cando ca sūriyo ca candasūriyā, nigamā ca
anya-e0805n3:261_1: janapadā ca nigamajanapadā, surā ca asurā ca garuḷā ca manujā ca bhujagā ca gandhabbā
anya-e0805n3:262: Kvaci ivaṇṇuvaṇṇantānaṁ pubbanipāto, yathā – aggi ca dhūmo ca aggidhūmā. Evaṁ gatibuddhibhujapaṭhaharakarasayā, dhātavo ca liṅgāni ca dhātuliṅgāni.
anya-e0805n3:263: Kvaci sarādiakārantānaṁ pubbanipāto, yathā – attho ca dhammo ca atthadhammā. Evaṁ atthasaddā, saddatthā vā.
anya-e0805n3:264: Samāhāre pana – ‘‘cakkhu ca sotañcā’’ti atthe ‘‘nāmānaṁ samuccayo dvando’’ti dvandasamāsaṁ katvā vibhattilopādimhi kate –
anya-e0805n3:266: 359.Tathā dvande pāṇi tūriya yogga senaṅga khuddajantuka vividha viruddha visabhāgatthādīnañca.
anya-e0805n3:267: Yathā digusamāse, tathā samāhāradvandasamāsepi pāṇi tūriya yogga senaṅgatthānaṁ, khuddajantukavividha viruddhavisabhāgatthaiccevamādīnañca ekattaṁ hoti, napuṁsakaliṅgattañca.
anya-e0805n3:268_0: Pāṇino ca tūriyāni ca yoggāni ca senā cāti pāṇitūriya yoggasenā, tāsamaṅgāni pāṇitūriyayoggasenaṅgāni,
anya-e0805n3:268_1: dvandato parattā aṅgasaddo paccekamabhisambajjhate. Khuddā ca te jantukā ceti khuddajantukā,
anya-e0805n3:268_2: vividhenākārena viruddhā vividhaviruddhā, niccavirodhino. Samāno bhāgo yesaṁ te sabhāgā,
anya-e0805n3:268_3: ‘‘tesu vuddhī’’tiādinā samānassa saādeso, vividhā ca te lakkhaṇato sabhāgā ca kiccatoti
anya-e0805n3:268_4: visabhāgā. Pāṇitūriyayoggasenaṅgāni ca khuddajantukā ca vividhaviruddhā ca visabhāgā
anya-e0805n3:268_5: cāti dvando, idha bahuttā pubbanipātassa aniyamo, te atthā yesaṁ te pāṇitūriyayoggasenaṅgakhuddajantukavividhaviruddhavisabhāgatthā,
anya-e0805n3:269_1: dvande ekattaṁ, napuṁsakaliṅgattañca, iti pāṇyaṅgatthabhāvato cakkhusotasaddānaṁ
anya-e0805n3:269_2: iminā ekattaṁ, napuṁsakaliṅgattañca katvā samāsattā nāmabyapadese kate syādyuppatti amādesādi.
anya-e0805n3:270_0: Cakkhusotaṁ, he cakkhusota, cakkhusotaṁ, cakkhusotena. Evaṁ sabbatthekavacanameva.
anya-e0805n3:270_1: Mukhañca nāsikā ca mukhanāsikaṁ, ‘‘saro rasso napuṁsake’’ti antassa rassattaṁ, hanu
anya-e0805n3:270_2: ca gīvā ca hanugīvaṁ. Evaṁ kaṇṇanāsaṁ, pāṇipādaṁ, chavimaṁsalohitaṁ. Hatthapādā maṁsalohitānītiādīnaṁ
anya-e0805n3:271_0: Tūriyaṅgatthe gītañca vāditañca gītavāditaṁ, sammañca tāḷañca sammatāḷaṁ, sammanti
anya-e0805n3:271_1: kaṁsatāḷaṁ. Tāḷanti hatthatāḷaṁ. Saṅkhe ca paṇavo ca ḍiṇḍimo ca, saṅkhā ca paṇavā
anya-e0805n3:271_2: ca ḍaṁṇḍimā cāti vā saṅkhapaṇavaḍiṇḍimaṁ, paṇavādayo dvepi bheriviseso.
anya-e0805n3:272: Yoggaṅgatthe yathā – phālo ca pācanañca phālapācanaṁ, yugañca naṅgalañca yuganaṅgalaṁ.
anya-e0805n3:273_0: Senaṅgatthe hatthino ca assā ca hatthiassaṁ, rathā ca pattikā ca rathapattikaṁ, asi
anya-e0805n3:273_1: ca cammañca asicammaṁ, cammanti saravāraṇaphalakaṁ. Dhanu ca kalāpo ca dhanukalāpaṁ, kalāpoti tūṇīraṁ.
anya-e0805n3:274: Khuddajantukatthe ḍaṁsā ca makasā ca ḍaṁsamakasaṁ. Evaṁ kunthakipillikaṁ, kīṭapaṭaṅgaṁ, kīṭasarīsapaṁ. Tattha kunthā sukhumakipillikā, kīṭā kapālapiṭṭhikapāṇā.
anya-e0805n3:275: Vividhaviruddhatthe ahi ca nakulo ca, ahī ca nakulā cāti vā ahinakulaṁ. Evaṁ biḷāramūsikaṁ, antassa rassattaṁ, kākolūkaṁ, sappamaṇḍūkaṁ, garuḷasappaṁ.
anya-e0805n3:276_0: Visabhāgatthe sīlañca paññāṇañca sīlapaññāṇaṁ, samatho ca vipassanā ca samathavipassanaṁ.
anya-e0805n3:276_1: Evaṁ nāmarūpaṁ, hirottappaṁ. Satisampajaññaṁ, lobhamohaṁ, dosamohaṁ, ahirikānottappaṁ,
anya-e0805n3:276_3: niddesadassanato katthaci napuṁsakaliṅgattaṁ na hotīti daṭṭhabbaṁ, tena ādhipaccaparivāro
anya-e0805n3:277: Aññoññaliṅgavisesitānaṁ dvande dāsī ca dāso ca dāsidāsaṁ, ‘‘kvacādī’’tiādinā majjhe rassattaṁ. Evaṁ itthipumaṁ, pattacīvaraṁ, sākhāpalāsamiccādi.
anya-e0805n3:278_0: Saṅkhyāparimāṇatthānaṁ dvande ekakañca dukañca ekakadukaṁ, saṅkhyādvande appasaṅkhyā
anya-e0805n3:278_1: pubbaṁ nipatati. Evaṁ dukatikaṁ, tikacatukkaṁ, catukkapañcakaṁ, dīgho ca majjhimo ca dīghamajjhimaṁ.
anya-e0805n3:279_0: Pacanacaṇḍālatthānaṁ dvande orabbhikā ca sūkarikā ca orabbhikasūkarikaṁ. Evaṁ sākuṇikamāgavikaṁ,
anya-e0805n3:279_1: sapāko ca caṇḍālo ca sapākacaṇḍālaṁ, pukkusachavaḍāhakaṁ, venarathakāraṁ. Tattha
anya-e0805n3:280_0: Disatthānaṁ dvande pubbā ca aparā cāti atthe dvandasamāsaṁ, vibhattilopañca katvā
anya-e0805n3:280_1: idhādiggahaṇena ekatte, napuṁsakaliṅgatte ca kate ‘‘saro rasso napuṁsake’’ti rassattaṁ,
anya-e0805n3:280_2: pubbāparaṁ , he pubbāpara, pubbāparaṁ, pubbāparena, pubbāparassa iccādi. Evaṁ puratthimapacchimaṁ,
anya-e0805n3:282: 360.Vibhāsā rukkha tiṇa pasu dhana dhañña janapadādīnañca.
anya-e0805n3:283: Rukkha tiṇa pasu dhana dhañña janapadādīnamekattaṁ, napuṁsakaliṅgattañca vibhāsā hoti dvande samāse. Ekattābhāve bahuvacanaṁ, parasseva liṅgañca.
anya-e0805n3:284_0: Tattha rukkhānaṁ dvande assatthā ca kapitthā cāti atthe samāhāre dvandasamāsādimhi
anya-e0805n3:284_1: kate iminā vikappenekattaṁ, napuṁsakaliṅgattañca. Assatthakapitthaṁ, assatthakapitthā
anya-e0805n3:284_2: vā. Evaṁ ambapanasaṁ, ambapanasā vā, khadirapalāsaṁ, khadirapalāsā vā, dhavassakaṇṇakaṁ, dhavassakaṇṇakā vā.
anya-e0805n3:285: Tiṇānaṁ dvande usīrāni ca bīraṇāni ca usīrabīraṇaṁ, usīrabīraṇāni vā. Evaṁ muñjapabbajaṁ, muñjapabbajā vā, kāsakusaṁ, kāsakusā vā.
anya-e0805n3:286_0: Pasūnaṁ dvande ajā ca eḷakā ca ajeḷakaṁ, ajeḷakā vā, hatthī ca gāvo ca assā ca vaḷavā
anya-e0805n3:286_2: cā’’ti avādeso ca, gomahiṁsaṁ, gomahiṁsā vā, eṇeyyavarāhaṁ, eṇeyyavarāhā vā, sīhabyagghataracchaṁ,
anya-e0805n3:287: Dhanānaṁ dvande hiraññañca suvaṇṇañca hiraññasuvaṇṇaṁ, hiraññasuvaṇṇāni vā. Evaṁ jātarūparajataṁ, jātarūparajatāni vā, maṇimuttasaṅkhaveḷuriyaṁ, maṇimuttasaṅkhaveḷuriyā vā.
anya-e0805n3:288: Dhaññānaṁdvande sālī ca yavā ca sāliyavaṁ, sāliyavā vā. Evaṁ tilamuggamāsaṁ, tilamuggamāsā vā.
anya-e0805n3:289: Janapadānaṁ dvande kāsī ca kosalā ca kāsikosalaṁ, kāsikosalā vā, vajjī ca mallā ca vajjimallaṁ, vajjimallā vā, aṅgā ca magadhā ca aṅgamagadhaṁ, aṅgamagadhā vā.
anya-e0805n3:290_0: Ādiggahaṇena aññoññappaṭipakkhadhammānaṁ, sakuṇatthānañca dvande vibhāsā ekattaṁ
anya-e0805n3:290_1: hoti, napuṁsakaliṅgattañca. Kusalañca akusalañca kusalākusalaṁ, kusalākusalā vā,
anya-e0805n3:290_2: evaṁ sāvajjānavajjaṁ, sāvajjānavajjā vā, hīnappaṇītaṁ, hīnappaṇītā vā, kaṇhasukkaṁ,
anya-e0805n3:290_3: kaṇhasukkā vā, sukhadukkhaṁ, sukhadukkhāni vā, paṭighānunayaṁ, paṭighānunayā vā,
anya-e0805n3:290_4: chāyātapaṁ, chāyātapā vā, ālokandhakāraṁ, ālokandhakārā vā, ratti ca divā ca rattindivaṁ,
anya-e0805n3:290_5: rattindivā vā, ahañca ratti ca ahorattaṁ, ahorattā vā, ‘‘kvaci samāsanta’’iccādinā ākārikārānamattaṁ.
anya-e0805n3:291: Sakuṇānaṁ dvande haṁsā ca bakā ca haṁsabakaṁ, haṁsabakā vā. Evaṁ kāraṇḍavacakkavākaṁ, kāraṇḍavacakkavākā vā, mayūrakoñcaṁ, mayūrakoñcā vā, sukasālikaṁ, sukasālikā vā.
anya-e0805n3:300: Digu dudhā tappuriso, aṭṭhadhā navadhā bhave;
